description:
A weird mikoshi appears at the convenience store... and the one riding it was Thouzer. The ones carrying the mikoshi were his students at his English cram school. One of those kids happens to escape and asks the three brothers for help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Whaccha Name!! Sauza no Eigo Juku / Hito Natsu no Kobushi wa no Kazu Dake Atatata!!
What`s Your Name? Thouzer`s English Cram School \ One Summer`s Fist, as Many as the Waves!
ホワッチャーネーム!! サウザーの英語塾 / ひと夏の拳 波の数だけアタタタタっ!
